title: I can't play league anymore because of new client
body: My computer lags too much with new client, but not with legacy client. Is there any hope that I can have that the legacy client will be up again and not lag anymore?

replies.body: Click the cog to the top right of the client > check the box "Enable low spec mode".

Riney has a pretty good suggestion there. Our low-spec mode in the updated client should be able to help you out quite a bit. Hit me back up if that doesn't seem to help!

https://i.gyazo.com/45909b8b4b68c319986f91a2f865b7d3.png
It's still lagging, is there anything else I should do?

Rineyy's got some good suggestions there, but if those still don't seem to help go ahead and hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). We can do a lot more with some one on one troubleshooting there!

1. Ensure your OS is up to date.
2. Ensure your drivers are up to date.
3. Close other applications when running League.
4. Perform a cleanup and a registry clean with [CCleaner.](http://www.piriform.com/ccleaner) This should speed up your computer slightly.
5. You can also perform a virus scan to ensure no malware is slowing you down. I recommend [Malwarebytes](https://www.malwarebytes.com/mwb-download/thankyou/) for this job.

[Grant League permission to run on your computer!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)
